channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Monitoring
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Monitoring

item.title: CVE-2019-4131|2024-09-17T02:53:12.357Z -- ibm -- monitoring
item.description: IBM Application Performance Management (IBM Monitoring 8.1.4) could allow a remote attacker to induce the application to perform server-side DNS lookups of arbitrary domain names. IBM X-Force ID: 158270.

item.title: CVE-2018-1442|2024-09-17T00:31:34.176Z -- ibm -- monitoring
item.description: IBM Application Performance Management - Response Time Monitoring Agent (IBM Monitoring 8.1.4) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 139598.

item.title: CVE-2018-1387|2024-09-17T00:45:49.386Z -- ibm -- monitoring
item.description: IBM Application Performance Management for Monitoring & Diagnostics (IBM Monitoring 8.1.3 and 8.1.4) may release sensitive personal data to the staff who can access to the database of this product. IBM X-Force ID: 138210.
